snippet: HOFFSTEIN--Robert. May 18, 2016, at the age of 89. Loving husband, father and grandfather. Although his passions were mysticism and philosophy, Bob enjoyed a long and productive career at Pace University. Services will be held at Menorah Chapel in Staten Island on May 20th at 12pm. 1/3
lead_paragraph: HOFFSTEIN--Robert. May 18, 2016, at the age of 89. Loving husband, father and grandfather. Although his passions were mysticism and philosophy, Bob enjoyed a long and productive career at Pace University. Services will be held at Menorah Chapel in Staten Island on May 20th at 12pm. 1/3
